synopses.synopsis: In an era when radio emphasis was on Hollywood stars in film adaptations, The Damon Runyon Theater was like a cool breeze. The series had charm: the guys were guys, the dolls were dolls, and a gun was a roscoe... - On the Air: The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio by John Dunning
